descriptionHtml:
[B][SIZE=6]Please endorse if you liked this file[/SIZE][/B]

[B][SIZE=6]BETA Information[/SIZE][/B]
ALWAYS backup your saves and be prepared to find bugs because this mod is still in beta. Please send any suggestions, comments or bugs via PM or the comments section. I feel the mod is a lot more stable than v0.3.0, I can not however guarantee future versions will be compatible with current versions. I would also like some advice on the in-game menu\'s as far as text goes, maybe better wording of certain elements as I am not a native English speaker.

HOW TO USE:
Either create a new character and activate the statue, or level up a skill with an existing character

Commands to help with testing:
incpcs [Skill] - Level up a skill (i.e. incpcs Destruction) 

Known issues:
- The mod will trigger early if you level up a skill before reaching the statue

[B][SIZE=6]Information[/SIZE][/B]
This mod adds both custom and preconfigured archetypes to the game. Preconfigured archetypes have been taken from the official PRIMA guide. You can choose 2 primary and 2 secondary skills which will grant you bonus experience (25 and 15 percent). You can also choose 6 different perks that will given for free once you meet the skill requirements (even if you do not meet the prerequisite).

[B][SIZE=6]Installation[/SIZE][/B]
Skyrim Nexus (Manual):
1. Download the archive
2. Unpack everything to \"Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\" (x64)
or \"Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\" (x86)
3. Launch skyrim and choose Data Files
4. Check \"Load\" in front of \"SCA - Skyrim Character Archtypes\"
5. Start the game

[B][SIZE=6]Mod Compatibility[/SIZE][/B]
This mod should only cause issues if another mod edits the same area inside Helgen Keep

[B][SIZE=6]Changelog[/SIZE][/B]
I have removed some previously available information from this page as it was no longer up to date, please use the in-game menu\'s or book for information about the mod.

[B]Version 0.3.8 BETA[/B]
- Fixed the archetype configuration screen appearing on skill level up even though the mod was already configured
NOTE: This bugfix should not cause any issues with previous versions

[B]Version 0.3.7 BETA[/B]
- Added a \"statue\" taken from Calcelmo\'s Tower which now acts as the activator for the mod (see images)
- Added statistics to each PRIMA archetype choice
- Tweaked other small parts of the menu
- The book is no longer needed and not given automatically, it\'s now on the ground next to the \"statue\" Note: The book no longer acts as the activator for the mod, this means that you will have to level up a skill if you want to activate it on an existing character.

[B]Version 0.3.0 BETA (Complete rewrite)[/B]
- The ability to create a custom class
- Primary skills gain a 25 percent experience bonus (previously 60)
- Secondary skills gain a 15 percent experience bonus (previously 40)
- Reduced experience can now be configured in-game (5 to 50 percent, 5% increments)
- Bonus and reduced experience shown in the Magic Effects menu

[B]Version 0.2.0[/B]
- Perks are now granted after choosing an archetype, the mod previously only checked on skill level up
- Now checks if an archetype has been chosen at skill level up
- Improved scripting, reducing the size of the mod

[B]Version 0.1.2[/B]
- Repackaged the mod, a script refused to be packed inside the .bsa file

[B]Version 0.1.1[/B]
- Initial release
author: QuietusPlus
